title: Minimal Reliance on Oil for Electricity
description: In 2022, Paraguay produced only 0.002% of its electricity from oil sources, showcasing its minimal reliance on oil for power generation.

title: Negligible CO2 Emissions from Waste
description: Paraguay's CO2 emissions from waste were just 0.0001 Mt CO2e in 2023, reflecting its low environmental impact from waste management.

title: Strong Trade Ties with Latin America & the Caribbean
description: In 2023, 66.04% of Paraguay's merchandise exports were directed towards low- and middle-income economies in Latin America & the Caribbean, indicating robust regional trade connections.
